featured.text: With the completion of several public ______ projects, such as the MRT, commuting to work has become easier for people living in the suburbs.

definition.zh_def: 捷運，指城市中的快速交通系統，通常是地下或高架的鐵路系統。
definition.en_def: MRT stands for Mass Rapid Transit, a type of high-capacity public transport system, typically involving trains that operate on dedicated tracks.
definition.example: I took the MRT to work to avoid traffic.
